titleStmt.title: Psyche a tragedy / written by Tho. Shadwell.
titleStmt.author: Shadwell, Thomas, 1642?-1692.
Molière, 1622-1673. Psyché.
Locke, Matthew, 1621 or 2-1677.
Draghi, Giovanni Battista, ca. 1640-1708.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by T.N. for Henry Herringman ...,

notesStmt.note: Considered by some to be the first English opera. Cf. NUC pre-1956.
Includes untitled songs without the music by Matthew Locke and Draghi. Cf. New Grove.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
